patthana11.8:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 4.)
patthana11.8:0.3_0: he too are inferior and superior to the inferior ones.

patthana11.8:2.1_4: who have not reached four approaches.

patthana11.8:4.1_4: is ignorant of the Holy One.
